android.car.vms

类 VmsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.vms.VmsClient

  • public final class VmsClient
extends java.lang.Object
    API implementation for use by Vehicle Map Service clients. This API can be obtained by registering a callback with VmsClientManager.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

      • VmsClient

        public VmsClient(IVmsBrokerService service,

    • 方法详细资料

      • getProviderDescription

        public byte[] getProviderDescription(int providerId)
        Retrieves registered information about a Vehicle Map Service data provider.

        Data layers may be associated with multiple providers in updates received via VmsClientManager.VmsClientCallback.onLayerAvailabilityChanged(VmsAvailableLayers), and clients can use this query to determine a provider or subset of providers to subscribe to.

        参数:
        providerId - Provider ID
        返回:
        Provider's registration information, or null if unavailable

      • setSubscriptions

        public void setSubscriptions(java.util.Set<VmsAssociatedLayer> layers)
        Sets this client's data layer subscriptions

        Existing subscriptions for the client will be replaced.

        参数:
        layers - Data layers to be subscribed

      • setMonitoringEnabled

        public void setMonitoringEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables the monitoring of Vehicle Map Service packets by this client.

        If monitoring is enabled, the client will receive all packets, regardless of any subscriptions. Enabling monitoring does not affect the client's existing subscriptions.

      • isMonitoringEnabled

        public boolean isMonitoringEnabled()
        Returns the current monitoring state of the client.

      • getAvailableLayers

        public VmsAvailableLayers getAvailableLayers()
        Returns the most recently received data layer availability.

      • registerProvider

        public int registerProvider(byte[] providerDescription)
        Registers a data provider with the Vehicle Map Service.
        参数:
        providerDescription - Identifying information about the data provider
        返回:
        Provider ID to use for setting offerings and publishing packets, or -1 on connection error

      • unregisterProvider

        public void unregisterProvider(int providerId)
        Unregisters a data provider with the Vehicle Map Service.
        参数:
        providerId - Provider ID

      • setProviderOfferings

        public void setProviderOfferings(int providerId,
                                 java.util.Set<VmsLayerDependency> offerings)
        Sets the data layer offerings for a provider registered through registerProvider(byte[]).

        Existing offerings for the provider ID will be replaced.

        参数:
        providerId - Provider ID
        offerings - Data layer offerings
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the client has not registered the provider

      • publishPacket

        public void publishPacket(int providerId,
                          VmsLayer layer,
                          byte[] packet)
        Publishes a Vehicle Maps Service packet.
        参数:
        providerId - Packet provider
        layer - Packet layer
        packet - Packet data
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the client does not offer the layer as the provider

      • getSubscriptionState

        public VmsSubscriptionState getSubscriptionState()
        Returns the most recently received data layer subscription state.

      • register

        public void register()
              throws RemoteException
        Registers this client with the Vehicle Map Service.
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • unregister

        public void unregister()
                throws RemoteException
        Unregisters this client from the Vehicle Map Service.
        抛出:
        RemoteException
